00003 //  Copyright: GPL

00005 //  Date: 16/05/06 21:10
00006 //  Description: Phoenix game library: started as
00007 //               a wrapper for SDL and OpenGL aimed
00008 //               at the fast creation of 2D games.
00009 //               It now includes many features needed
00010 //               For game development and is packaged
00011 //               As a staticly linked library.
